DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Estimated emissions of air pollutants in the Canton of Zurich
DATASET_PROVIDER: Ostluft & Amt für Abfall, Wasser, Energie und Luft (AWEL) / Kanton Zürich
DESCRIPTION: Estimated emissions of air pollutants in the Canton of Zürich for the years 2015, 2020, (2021) and 2030. Two datasets: One based on Submission 2023 data and one based on Submission 2019 data

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Monitoring data vehicle remote emission sensing (RSD)
DATASET_PROVIDER: Amt für Abfall, Wasser, Energie und Luft (AWEL) / Kanton Zürich
DESCRIPTION: The dataset contains hundreds of thousands of measurement data from measurement campaigns since 2002 (annually) and biennially since 2022

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Metadata for vehicle type, fuel  and euronorm required for RSD NOx-Emission analysis, compiled from various sources
DATASET_PROVIDER: Amt für Abfall, Wasser, Energie und Luft (AWEL) / Kanton Zürich
DESCRIPTION: Metadata for vehicle type, fuel  and euronorm required for RSD NOx-Emission analysis, compiled from various sources

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Filter criteria applied to RSD dataset
DATASET_PROVIDER: Amt für Abfall, Wasser, Energie und Luft (AWEL) / Kanton Zürich
DESCRIPTION: Filter criteria applied to RSD dataset

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality monitoring data Kanton Zürich from national monitoring network NABEL (yearly values)
DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality monitoring data Kanton Zürich from national monitoring network NABEL (yearly values)

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality monitoring data Kanton Zürich from intercantonal monitoring network Ostluft (yearly values)
DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality monitoring data Kanton Zürich from intercantonal monitoring network Ostluft (yearly values)

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality monitoring data Kanton Zürich from intercantonal monitoring network Ostluft (hourly values)
DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality monitoring data Kanton Zürich from intercantonal monitoring network Ostluft (hourly values); direct extract from NABEL database, cortesy of BAFU/NABEL

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality monitoring data Kanton Zürich from national monitoring network NABEL at site Zürich-Kaserne (hourly values)
DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality monitoring data Kanton Zürich from national monitoring network NABEL at site Zürich-Kaserne (hourly values); direct extract from NABEL database, cortesy of BAFU/NABEL

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality monitoring data Kanton Zürich from national monitoring network NABEL at site Dübendorf-Empa hourly values)
DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality monitoring data Kanton Zürich from national monitoring network NABEL at site Dübendorf Empa (hourly values)

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Selected nitrogen deposition monitoring data Kanton Zürich from intercantonal monitoring network Ostluft (yearly values)
DATASET_PROVIDER: Ostluft & Amt für Abfall, Wasser, Energie und Luft (AWEL) / Kanton Zürich
DESCRIPTION: pre-compiled Ostluft y1 monitoring data for nitrogen deposition to sensitive ecosystems into separate dataset

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Site metadata Ostluft
DATASET_PROVIDER: Ostluft & Amt für Abfall, Wasser, Energie und Luft (AWEL) / Kanton Zürich
DESCRIPTION: Ostluft monitoring site metadata

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality threshold values (LRV legal limits WHO air quality guideline)
DATASET_PROVIDER: Luftreinhalteverordnung, WHO airquality guidelines, compiled by Amt für Abfall, Wasser, Energie und Luft (AWEL) / Kanton Zürich
DESCRIPTION: Selected air quality threshold values (LRV legal limits WHO air quality guideline)

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Vector data administrative Canton and municipality boundaries Canton Zürich
DESCRIPTION: Municipal boundaries in general plan accuracy

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: PolluMap raster data yearly concentrations of mean NO2, PM10, PM2.5 and eBC
DESCRIPTION: PolluMap raster data yearly concentrations of mean for NO2, PM10, PM2.5 and eBC. Reference year is 2015, prognosis for 2020 and 2030. Layernames: no-2-20xx, pm-10-20xx, pm-25-20xx and bc-20xx

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Jahreskarten raster data yearly concentrations of mean nitrogen dioxide (NO2)
DESCRIPTION: NO2 concentrations in the Canton of Zurich for the period from 2020 to the present. Annual mean values in 20m x 20m spatial resolution.

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Jahreskarten raster data yearly concentrations of mean particulate matter PM10
DESCRIPTION: PM10 concentrations in the Canton of Zurich for the period from 2020 to the present. Annual mean values in 100m x 100m spatial resolution.

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Jahreskarten raster data yearly concentrations of mean particulate matter PM2.5
DESCRIPTION: PM2.5 concentrations in the Canton of Zurich for the period from 2020 to the present. Annual mean values in 100m x 100m spatial resolution.

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Jahreskarten raster data yearly concentrations Ozon, maximales monatliches 98-Perzentil
DESCRIPTION: Ozon maximum monthly 98th percentile concentrations in the Canton of Zurich for the period from 2020 to the present. Annual mean values in 100m x 100m spatial resolution.

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Modelled raster data ammonia concentrations
DESCRIPTION: Modelled raster data ammonia concentrations, spatial resolution: 500m x 500m

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Modelled raster data nitrogen deposition
DESCRIPTION: Modelled raster data nitrogen deposition, spatial resolution: 500m x 500m

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Modelled raster data exceedance of critical loads for nitrogen (CLN)
DESCRIPTION: Modelled raster data maximum exceedance of critical loads for nitrogen (CLN), spatial resolution 1000m x 1000m

DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Inhabitant population
DESCRIPTION: Population and households from 2010 onwards
